workout_groups.name: Mindset
workout_groups.description: Train mental resilience, discipline, and a positive outlook through mindset exercises.

workouts.name: Gratitude Journaling
workouts.description: Write three things you're grateful for to shift into a positive mindset.

workouts.name: Reframing Negativity
workouts.description: Identify negative thoughts and actively reframe them into neutral or positive ones.

workouts.name: Stoic Mindset Exercise
workouts.description: Visualize setbacks and practice emotional detachment to improve resilience.

workouts.name: Cold Exposure Training
workouts.description: Expose yourself to controlled discomfort (cold water, fasting) to build mental toughness.

workouts.name: Affirmation Conditioning
workouts.description: Repeat affirmations with conviction to rewire self-belief and confidence.

workout_groups.name: Advanced Mindset Training
workout_groups.description: Train the mind to develop unshakable resilience, discipline, and a mindset of indomitable willpower.

workouts.name: Cold Endurance Challenge
workouts.description: Expose yourself to cold temperatures while focusing on maintaining internal control.

workouts.name: Mental Reversal Drill
workouts.description: Take a perceived weakness or failure and mentally flip it into a strength-building narrative.

workouts.name: Ego Death Training
workouts.description: Detach from all personal identity and perceived self-limitations in deep introspection.

workouts.name: Ultra-Long Endurance Hold
workouts.description: Hold a physically and mentally demanding position (e.g., deep squat, plank) for extreme durations.

workouts.name: Adversity Simulation
workouts.description: Simulate a crisis scenario mentally and practice controlled emotional and cognitive response.

workout_groups.name: Mental Conditioning Techniques
workout_groups.description: Train the mind to develop unshakable resilience, discipline, and a mindset of indomitable willpower.

workouts.name: Controlled Discomfort Training
workouts.description: Engage in activities that induce mild discomfort (cold showers, fasting) to build mental toughness.

workouts.name: Mental Fortitude Drill
workouts.description: Visualize overcoming significant challenges to strengthen mental resilience.

workouts.name: Emotional Detachment Practice
workouts.description: Practice detaching from emotional responses to maintain clarity and focus under stress.

workouts.name: Extreme Focus Challenge
workouts.description: Maintain deep focus on a single task while blocking out all distractions for an extended period.

workouts.name: Crisis Management Simulation
workouts.description: Mentally simulate a crisis scenario and practice controlled emotional and cognitive response.

workout_groups.name: Psi Mindset Techniques
workout_groups.description: Break through reality constraints, reshape perception, and develop an indomitable psi-mind.

workouts.name: Reality Fluidity Conditioning
workouts.description: Mentally train for the fluidity of reality perception, dissolving rigid belief structures.

workouts.name: Quantum Observer Effect Training
workouts.description: Train the mind to influence probability through precise mental intention.

workouts.name: No-Self Integration
workouts.description: Dissolve the construct of self entirely, integrating with the universal intelligence field.
